events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focused on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
We completed an initial screening of your technical skills and experience, and we are interested in moving forward.
Thank you for the update. I am very interested in further discussions and available for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
The technical interview went well. The interviewers appreciated your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. The HR team noted your cultural fit and enthusiasm.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive salary and benefits.
I appreciate the offer and am excited by the opportunity. Looking forward to joining your engineering team.
I formally accept the offer for the Software Engineer role and am eager to start contributing.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setting up your development environment and access credentials.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome to the team as a full-time Software Engineer.
